programme.title: Assir Al Madfoun
programme.desc: A murder case that remained unsolved for 10 years is reopened when the victim's friend reappears and his father points an accusing finger at the long-absent friend.

programme.title: Life Song
programme.desc: Beyram returns to his native Istanbul to reconcile with his close friend, and they agree to marry their children Kerim and Melek when they grow up. Kerim grew up in Germany; but his father forces him to return and marry Melek, but Hulya, Melek's younger sister, wants to marry him.

programme.title: Dirou Niya
programme.desc: The comedy takes place at a working-class cafe located in the heart of a neighborhood, where the characters are passionate about by football, and it's always the talk of the hour, especially with the presence of Mahmoud and Al Kushi, two ex-footballers fighting over glory.

programme.title: My Home My Destiny
programme.desc: Zeynep is a young law student who finds herself torn between her two mothers. She has been trying for years to equalize the two parties and is appreciative of her mother's genuine sacrifices, but she also works hard to fulfill her mother's other ambitions.

programme.title: Assir Al Madfoun

programme.title: My Siblings
programme.desc: The events of the series revolve around the life and fate of four siblings after the death of their father, as they are forced to struggle in life and face some obstacles in their way.

programme.title: Secrets of an Angel
programme.desc: After years of abuse at the hands of her husband, Cennet phones Zeynep, a lawyer. After his death, he leaves a letter, which turns out to be a criminal complaint, upon which the lives of Cennet's children and Yilmaz will never be the same after that day.

programme.desc: Presenting the social differences between the upper and lower classes and the problems that arise from them, through highlighting the contradictions experienced by prominent figures, as well as the dangers that young people face in life, in addition to displaying the problems of state employees.

programme.title: Zanghat Arreeh
programme.desc: A historical drama set in Libya during the period of the British colonization. It discusses the relations between Muslims and Jews, and the preferential treatment the British gave to the Italian and western communities.

programme.desc: The events revolve around a smart thirteen-year-old boy named Ekans, who acquires a supernatural power that gives him the ability to control snakes. Using modern technology, he is able to confront villains and keep his city safe.

programme.title: Portreh
programme.desc: On the recommendation of his father's former sweetheart, Hazem becomes the editor-in-chief of an economic magazine. As he falls in love with Rima, the niece of his father's ex, trouble soon follows since an old feud has Hazem's parents and Rima at odds over the history with Randa.

programme.title: Ahl Al Madina
programme.desc: The series presents a vast panorama of social and economic life and the conflict between those who want to erase the memory of the country so that history begins with them, and those who want to emphasize the continuity of the cultural heritage of the country.

programme.title: Sihr El Sharq
programme.desc: The series revolves around an English lady called Jane Digby,who's deeply fascinated by the East. She marries Sheikh Majool Al - Musallab ,who is a Badawi tribe leader and loves him dearly.

programme.title: Torjoman El-Ashwak
programme.desc: The show tells the story of three friends who decide to adopt the left-wing ideology. After each goes their way, one of them starts taking up Sufism and one maintains his leftist principles, which gets him into a lot of trouble. The third one decides to leave Syria, but returns after the civil war to find his missing daughter.

programme.title: Forsa Akhera
programme.desc: The story of a woman whose husband has died. She and her son move to live with his family. Afterwards, her relationship with another man causes many conflicts in the family.

programme.title: 30 Youm
programme.desc: Tarek Helmy is a young married psychiatrist who has a daughter named Farida. On her first birthday, a patient called Tawfiq Al-Masry comes to Tarek, explaining to him an experiment he wants to carry out: he will pick someone, "The Chosen", and put him through a cycle of self-destructive crises over thirty days.

programme.title: Al-Heiba
programme.desc: Alia lives with her husband and their son in a European country. When the husband dies, she returns to Lebanon to bury him, only to discover that his family wants to take her son away, unless she marries his brother Jabal. She also discovers that her husband's family are arms smugglers.

programme.title: Flight of Dreams
programme.desc: Sandhu's family comes from a small village in Punjab, however, as the family dreams of immigrating to Canada, the dreams of the two sisters Tejo and Jasmine soon change when fate brings them a different reality.

programme.title: Bab Al-Reih
programme.desc: Addressing the issue of the widespread violence that has taken over society, the series tells the story of a mailman who struggles with the fact that written mail is no longer being used, as he balances his professional struggles with the love he has for his family, especially his blind daughter.

programme.title: Bayn qalbayn
programme.desc: A romantic social drama that deals with the love story of the girl Ariam, who defended her love against the tough conditions she's living in at the time. She fell in love with Bashar despite being married to another.

programme.title: Nasibi Wa Qesmetik
programme.desc: Connected but separate episodes dealing with 15 different topics, divided into 3 episodes each topic, discussing the relationship between men and women, the problems that occur between them, and how they can be overcome.

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau - gyda hwyaid yn dawnsio yn y bath, drws hudol yn y parc, a chath yn coginio cacen! Welcome to a new series of Jamborî!

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Sam Tân a'i ffrindiau yn y pentre'. The adventures of Sam Tân and friends in the village.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae gwylan arall yn glanio yn yr harbwr ac mae'n edrych yn debyg iawn i Gwil! Mae'r wylan yn drysu Gwil a Celfin yn lân. Another seagull lands in the harbour and it looks a lot like Gwil!

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth i blant bach gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Pre-school science series with Tudur Phillips and his two friends.

programme.title: New: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Du yn ymuno â'r Criw Printio.Dysga sut mae melyn, Gwyrddlas, Majenta a Du yn gweithio hefo'i gilydd wrth brintio. Learn how yellow, cyan, magenta, and black work together in printing.

programme.title: New: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Pigog, Gwich, Dan a Crawc yn mynd lan yr afon i chwilio am y Graig Canu ddirgel. Pigog, Gwich, Dan and Crawc go on a boat journey upriver to find the mysterious Song Stone.

programme.title: New: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Mae Ben Dant ar antur newydd i ailgylchu a throi sbwriel yn sbeshal, a gwastraff yn gampwaith. Today, Ben Dant will be joining pupils at Ysgol Y Traeth to create excellent treasure.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae Blero a'i ffrindiau'n mynd i wersylla i Goedwig Ocido gyda Brethwen ac yn cyfarfod â mwy o anifeiliaid y nos na'r disgwyl. Blero and his friends go on a camping trip in Ocido Forest.

programme.title: New: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Huw yn ymuno â chriw o ffrindiau i badlfyrddio, ac awn am dro i Blas Newydd, Ynys Mon gyda Elain, Beca a Nel. Today, Huw paddleboards, and Meleri plays tennis with Jack.

programme.title: Cywion Bach
programme.desc: Cawn drip i ganolfan pili-palod sy'n gyfle gwych i weld pili pala go iawn - ac yn help i'r Cywion ddysgu mwy am y gair 'pili-pala'. A trip to the Butterfly Centre and the word 'pili-pala'.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae gan Seren fag yn llawn losin, mae Fflwff yn darganfod berfa yn llawn o ddail tra mae'r Capten yn gwagio bwced sydd yn llawn o ddwr. Come to Shwshaswyn for some calm and focus.

programme.title: Dathlu 'Da Dona
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Jac yn cael parti 'pobl sy'n helpu' gyda Cwnstabl Jêms o Cacamwnci. Jac will be having a 'people who help' party with Cwnstabl Jêms from Cacamwnci.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae prinder dwr ym Mhen Cyll. Mae Digbi a'i ffrindiau'n ceisio dysgu pam. There's a water-shortage in Pen Cyll. Digbi and his friends go in search of the reason.

programme.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
programme.desc: Dim ond un darn o arian sydd gan Panda - mae'n rhaid ei fod wedi colli'r gweddill. Tybed all ei ffrindiau ei helpu i ddod o hyd iddo? Panda has lost some money -can his friends find it?

programme.title: Sblij a Sbloj
programme.desc: Mae'r ddau ddireidus yn mynd i'r siop ddodrefn, gan lwyddo i golli'r lythyren 'n' oddi ar un o arwyddion y ffenest! The monsters visit a furniture shop and manage to lose the letter 'n'!

programme.title: Ben a Mali a'u byd bach o hud
programme.desc: Mae'r plant yn awyddus i wybod beth sy'n digwydd i'r sêr yn ystod y dydd felly maen nhw'n ymweld â'r Coblyn Doeth yn y llyfrgell. The children visit the Wise Old Elf in the Elf Library.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido

programme.title: Awyr Iach

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori

programme.title: Jen a Jim a'r Cywiadur

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: New: Byd Tad-cu

programme.title: Nos Da Cyw

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Aba-dw-bi-dii! Mae'n amser i chwarae 'gêm y geiriau' unwaith eto. 'Siglen' yw'r gair heddiw. Abadoobedee! It's time for another word game adventure. Today's word is 'swing'.

programme.title: Y Diwrnod Mawr
programme.desc: A fydd gan Dewi'r hyder i berfformio fel cerflun byw ar ei ddiwrnod mawr yng Ngwyl Nol a Mlan? Dewi's plan is to raise money for the local festival by performing as a robot living statue!

programme.title: Guto Gwningen

programme.title: Llan-ar-goll-en
programme.desc: Mae'r Maer ar fin dadorchuddio bowlen grisial arbennig iawn yn neuadd y pentref pan mae'n sylwi ei bod wedi diflannu! Who took the village's very expensive crystal bowl and why?

programme.title: Odo

programme.title: Stiw
programme.desc: Mae Stiw'n gwneud cerdyn arbennig i roi i'r teulu i gyd ar Ddydd Santes Dwynwen. Stiw makes a very special card to give the family on St Dwynwen's Day to show how much he loves them all.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ag anifeiliaid bach y byd. Yn y rhaglen hon, yr hippo a'r camel sy'n cael y sylw. In this programme, we get to know the hippo and the camel.

programme.title: Patrôl Pawennau
programme.desc: Pan mae'r cwn yn darganfod teithiwr cudd ar y Pencadfws, rhaid iddynt achub cath fach ar ffo. When the pups find a stowaway on their trip to the Icy Tundra, they have to rescue a kitten.
